column3: Make Modal backdrop click exit only if mousedown and mouse up are outside of element.\nCurrent: only mouseup event position is accounted

Basic chat rooms:
- GUI: can type and send message
- API: message is received and saved
- API: can fetch messages by created_at
- GUI: show messages (with date and author username)
Auto submit action on Enter  / Ctrl+Enter
List of current user in the room
Handle multiple connections by same user
